name: Goobly
description:
You play as a hungry hungry slime. The wizards of the kingdom are assaulting you with a variety of foods. Each food has a unique power-up if eaten. The slime must also regurgitate its food to force the wizards to run away. Get close to a wizard and attempt to eat it for a surprise.

Controls:

WASD - Movement E - Eat
Mouse - Aim
Left-Click - Fire

Power-Ups:

Bellpepper - Fire projectile speed up
Cupcake - Speed boost
Slime - Gain a heart
Egg - Ignore next hit
Bean - Propel the slime forward

Credits:

Tileset/Buttons - https://opengameart.org/content/the-field-of-the-floating-islands (Buch)

Slime (Adjusted) - https://opengameart.org/content/slime-monster-24x24 (Bonsaiheldin)

Background Music - https://opengameart.org/content/the-slimekings-tower-ost-retro-like (CodeManu)

Slime SFX - https://opengameart.org/content/40-cc0-water-splash-slime-sfx (rubberduck)

All other art - made by me during jam
